name: Sameday
headline: AI sales agents for home service businesses
description: Home service businesses, like plumbers and roofers, are losing millions of dollars each year by failing to answer the phone. Sameday's AI Sales Agent answers any calls they otherwise would miss and will follow up until every lead is on the schedule.

founders.name: Aaron Cooper, Founder
founders.description: Formerly the Chief Marketing Officer of the fastest growing home services company in the US. I now run a startup that solves the biggest pain in the home services space. Answering the phone.

# AI Phone Answering System for Home Services
## Never miss a new customer.
Sameday's AI answering service will speak with customers and book appointments — just like your best salesperson.
[Book a demo](https://www.gosameday.com/<#>)
Start taking calls with AI as soon as today! No contract required.
[![Roofer working on a roof with a bubble above his head of a phone conversation.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668578392ec543c3cc253b3e/670c49f48176cc1f3804c471_Plumber%20with%20colorful%20work%20van%20\(2\).avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66857718732f7f4290dd3c8d/66857718732f7f4290dd3e53_Exit%20Icon%20\(6\).svg)Play demo ](https://www.gosameday.com/<#>)

## Sameday speaks for itself.
## 92%
Successful booking rate by phone.
## 49
States with businesses using Sameday
## 8/10
Companies recommend Sameday's AI
![A rectangular image of a neighborhood with a yellow gradient layered over the top.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668578392ec543c3cc253b3e/66870ef255490ebbc551c120_66857718732f7f4290dd3ec4_Website%20background.webp)

"Hi yeah, I need to know how soon you guys can come out?"
![An image of purple texts flowing up and down like rolling hills. Meant to illustrate a talking AI Agent.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668578392ec543c3cc253b3e/6687177b41e5caefd75daf08_66857718732f7f4290dd3f69_ezgif.com-svg-to-png-converter%20\(1\).webp)

"Oh my, that sounds urgent, I can have one of our techs over within the hour. That work?"
## AI as effective as your best salesperson.
Like your best salesperson, Sameday AI identifies customer needs and provides tailored solutions—communicating clearly about your services and making appointments based on your technicians' location, qualification, and schedule.Our AI understands and clearly communicates based on:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/668578392ec543c3cc253b3e/6723b42651d51f96fbb9ae1a_Street%20Sign.svg)

## 24/7 scheduling for fewer lost leads.
Service businesses pay four times more to generate leads than most local businesses. To tackle this challenge, Sameday AI operates continuously, enabling the forwarding of overflow and after-hour calls directly to our AI, which can promptly address new customers' questions and offer the earliest available appointment.
## Win, again and again.
Sameday never misses a call, never forgets to follow up, and always shows up for work.

## Frequently asked questions.
A tool this powerful is going to spark up a question or two.
[General](https://www.gosameday.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Payments](https://www.gosameday.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Application](https://www.gosameday.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Other](https://www.gosameday.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
## Do I have to sign a contract?
With our standard pricing, we do not have any contracts or long term commitments, meaning anyone can give Sameday a try without signing a long-term contract.
### Do I have to change my phone number?
No. When we create your Sameday Sales Agent, we will generate a phone number that you can transfer calls to. So when a customer calls your existing number and you miss that call, you can set your phone system to transfer to us. No more missed calls!
### What is your privacy policy?
Sameday does not lend or sell any information related to your business. Any information collected by Sameday is strictly diagnostic to improve our services or delivered back to you through our dashboard to help you improve your business.
### How do I integrate Sameday?
Our onboarding team will help you integrate Sameday into your industry-specific CRM so we can directly schedule appointments. If you don't have a CRM, then we can deliver information to a secure online dashboard.
## When do I get billed?
We bill all of our customers at the first of the month for any qualified scheduled appointments. Customers are able to request a review of any leads and get refunded if your dispute is approved.
### Do I have to pay per appointment?
We have custom pricing options for our enterprise customers, but are willing to work with most businesses to find a pricing model that makes the most sense for their business. Just ask when you schedule your demo.
### Can we collect payments with Sameday?
Yes, Sameday can collect payment, but we try to defer to your CRM for collection if possible. If your field service software (FSM) is able to send a SMS or email with a payment link, Sameday will instruct it to do so.
### Can I negotiate a better rate?
All of our agreements allow you to contact us with 30 days notice to discuss getting a better rate for your business. It's important for us to be flexible and provide a stellar answering service for everyone in a way that makes sense.
## Does Sameday have a dashboard?
Yes, the Sameday Dashboard allows you to see every call we handle, the results and a complete transcript, and the recording. Through the dashboard, you can customize, train, and give your AI personality.
### What sort of analytics are included?
You can expect everything you would get from an answering service, such as call time and results, plus feedback from our Artificial Intelligence about how you can improve your close rate.
### Does Sameday schedule appointments?
Yes. Sameday can fully schedule appointments. There are not many limitations on our end. The only limitations we see come via your CRM. If your CRM isn't very flexible, we still have many options that work for scheduling.
### What is Sameday's Pro-voice?
Pro-voice is our human-like AI voice. We have built and trained Pro-voice to apply many powerful sales techniques that can dramatically increase your booking rate. It's an AI people want to talk to.
## Does Sameday have a chat feature?
With Sameday AI, you get the added benefit of an always-available chat feature. This means customers can message at any time and receive immediate responses and support.
### Does Sameday have a mobile app?
Sameday AI boasts a mobile-optimized web app, ensuring you have access to our services from any mobile device, anywhere. This flexibility allows you to stay connected and manage customer interactions seamlessly, whether you're in the office or on the go.
### Can Sameday make outbound calls?
Outbound calling is accessible through our Enterprise Plan, tailored for organizations that require a more robust set of tools for their operations. This enables proactive engagement with clients, leads, and partners, allowing for more personalized interactions.
### What if I have multiple companies?
Sameday AI uniquely caters to entrepreneurs by offering the capability to host several brands under a single account. Each brand operates independently within your account for clear organization and customization. Usage of all brands contributes towards your overall account activity for ease of account management.

## 24/7 scheduling for fewer lost leads.
Service businesses pay four times more to generate leads than most local businesses. To tackle this challenge, Sameday AI operates continuously, enabling the forwarding of overflow and after-hour calls directly to our AI, which can promptly address new customers' questions and offer the earliest available appointment.

## Frequently asked questions.
A tool this powerful is going to spark up a question or two.
General⟨56⟩Payments⟨57⟩Application⟨58⟩Other⟨59⟩
## Do I have to sign a contract?
With our standard pricing, we do not have any contracts or long term commitments, meaning anyone can give Sameday a try without signing a long-term contract.
### Do I have to change my phone number?
No. When we create your Sameday Sales Agent, we will generate a phone number that you can transfer calls to. So when a customer calls your existing number and you miss that call, you can set your phone system to transfer to us. No more missed calls!
### What is your privacy policy?
Sameday does not lend or sell any information related to your business. Any information collected by Sameday is strictly diagnostic to improve our services or delivered back to you through our dashboard to help you improve your business.
### How do I integrate Sameday?
Our onboarding team will help you integrate Sameday into your industry-specific CRM so we can directly schedule appointments. If you don't have a CRM, then we can deliver information to a secure online dashboard.
## When do I get billed?
We bill all of our customers at the first of the month for any qualified scheduled appointments. Customers are able to request a review of any leads and get refunded if your dispute is approved.
### Do I have to pay per appointment?
We have custom pricing options for our enterprise customers, but are willing to work with most businesses to find a pricing model that makes the most sense for their business. Just ask when you schedule your demo.
### Can we collect payments with Sameday?
Yes, Sameday can collect payment, but we try to defer to your CRM for collection if possible. If your field service software (FSM) is able to send a SMS or email with a payment link, Sameday will instruct it to do so.
### Can I negotiate a better rate?
All of our agreements allow you to contact us with 30 days notice to discuss getting a better rate for your business. It's important for us to be flexible and provide a stellar answering service for everyone in a way that makes sense.
## Does Sameday have a dashboard?
Yes, the Sameday Dashboard allows you to see every call we handle, the results and a complete transcript, and the recording. Through the dashboard, you can customize, train, and give your AI personality.
### What sort of analytics are included?
You can expect everything you would get from an answering service, such as call time and results, plus feedback from our Artificial Intelligence about how you can improve your close rate.
### Does Sameday schedule appointments?
Yes. Sameday can fully schedule appointments. There are not many limitations on our end. The only limitations we see come via your CRM. If your CRM isn't very flexible, we still have many options that work for scheduling.
### What is Sameday's Pro-voice?
Pro-voice is our human-like AI voice. We have built and trained Pro-voice to apply many powerful sales techniques that can dramatically increase your booking rate. It's an AI people want to talk to.
## Does Sameday have a chat feature?
With Sameday AI, you get the added benefit of an always-available chat feature. This means customers can message at any time and receive immediate responses and support.
### Does Sameday have a mobile app?
Sameday AI boasts a mobile-optimized web app, ensuring you have access to our services from any mobile device, anywhere. This flexibility allows you to stay connected and manage customer interactions seamlessly, whether you're in the office or on the go.
### Can Sameday make outbound calls?
Outbound calling is accessible through our Enterprise Plan, tailored for organizations that require a more robust set of tools for their operations. This enables proactive engagement with clients, leads, and partners, allowing for more personalized interactions.
### What if I have multiple companies?
Sameday AI uniquely caters to entrepreneurs by offering the capability to host several brands under a single account. Each brand operates independently within your account for clear organization and customization. Usage of all brands contributes towards your overall account activity for ease of account management.
## Still have questions?Schedule a time to speak with one of our account representatives. generated_description:
### Sameday: Revolutionizing Customer Outreach in Home Services

**Company Overview**  
Founded in 2021 and nestled in Lehi, Utah, Sameday is setting the pace for how home service businesses—like plumbers, roofers, HVAC specialists, and pest control providers—connect with their customers. As part of Y Combinator's Winter 2023 batch, Sameday has quickly gained traction. With a dynamic team of seven and led by group partner Gustaf Alstromer, they are addressing a critical pain point: missed calls.

**Mission**  
Sameday's mission is straightforward: utilize AI sales agents to ensure that home service businesses never miss a customer interaction. By answering calls and diligently following up on leads, Sameday helps businesses capture valuable opportunities that would otherwise slip through the cracks.

**Problem Addressed**  
Home service industries lose millions annually because they fail to pick up the phone. Sameday's AI-driven answering service acts like the top-performing salesperson, effectively engaging callers, identifying their needs, and booking appointments seamlessly.

**Key Features**  
- **24/7 Availability**: Sameday's AI operates around the clock, handling customer inquiries and scheduling even during after-hours.
- **Custom Integrations**: They integrate effortlessly with leading service software like ServiceTitan, allowing smooth operation within existing workflows.
- **High Success Rates**: The AI boasts a 92% successful booking rate and operates in 49 states, showcasing its wide acceptance and effectiveness.

**Customer Testimonials**  
Users are raving about Sameday. For instance, Rob Greer from Rove Pest Control shared how they achieved "zero missed Google Local Services calls" after implementing Sameday. Similarly, Konnor Buscho from Way Cool Plumbing reported significant enhancements in customer retention and service issue management thanks to Sameday's handling over 4,000 calls in just four months.

**Tags**:  
Sameday is categorized under several relevant tech tags:
- Artificial Intelligence
- Generative AI
- B2B Solutions
- Sales Enablement
- Automation

**What’s Next?**  
It’s clear that Sameday doesn’t just aim to answer phones; they want to change the game for service businesses across all trades. With a focus on continuous improvement and integration of cutting-edge technology, the journey ahead looks promising. For those interested in seeing this technology in action, Sameday offers demos, making it easy to integrate their solutions without the burden of long-term commitments.

For more details on Sameday’s offerings and to schedule a demo, you can visit [Sameday's website](https://www.gosameday.com/).

This is just the beginning for Sameday—a fresh arrival in the home service sector that’s turning missed calls into appointments, one AI conversation at a time.
